mapper.insert: insert into board(bno, title, content, mid, category) values (tbl_board_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{mid}, #{category})
mapper.select: select bno,mid, title, regdate, content, count, category from board where bno=#{bno}
mapper.update: update board set count=count+1 where bno=#{bno}
mapper.select:
select bno, mid, title, content, regdate,count,category, case when (1>sysdate-regdate) then 1 else 0 end newflag,(select count(*) from reply where reply.bno = board.bno) reply_cnt from board where category in ('후기', '추천', '질문', '잡담')
order by bno desc
